title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Improving Statistical Literacy Based on Cultural Context

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Training for office/administrative professionals using real-world data cases encountered in workplace environments.

learning_goals: Learners can visualize region-specific public data (bar graphs, scatter plots, etc.) via mobile devices.
Learners can interpret culturally contextualized statistical data to develop work-related decision-making scenarios.
Learners can generate at least three critical questions about data collection methodologies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
